synopsis.text:
Konten shrine, a hidden gem nestled in the heart of the city, is home to more than just spiritual reverence. It's the backdrop for a unique and lively mahjong community, as depicted in the comical anime adaptation of the popular free-to-play online game, Mahjong Soul. This chibi-style comedy, titled Mahjong Soul Pon, brings to life the eccentric inhabitants of the shrine and their shared passion for the game.

Directed by Kenshir≈ç Morii at Scooter Films, the anime is set to air in April, as announced at the 'Nijisanji Mahjong Cup' tournament. The story revolves around Ichihime and her friends, who gather at the shrine not just to compete in mahjong, but to enjoy the camaraderie and festivities that come with it.

According to local lore, a victory at the shrine's mahjong table grants the winner their heart's desire. This legend draws in a diverse crowd, from serious players dreaming of achieving the elusive Thirteen Orphans hand, to casual enthusiasts simply seeking a fun game.

Mahjong Soul Pon promises a delightful blend of humor, friendship, and the thrill of the game. Prepare to be drawn into the whimsical world of the Mahjong Soul Shrine, where every tile drawn could change the course of the game, and perhaps, a life.
